Zerrikánská alchymie

Scrolls contain formulae for the following:
King and Queen: upon detonation the bomb magically evokes fear in opponents.
Crinfrid Oil: wounded opponents feel acute pain.

This scroll describes the accomplishments of Zerrikanian alchemists. It also contains the formulae for the bomb known as King and Queen and for Crinfrid Oil.
